src:
Red Star Belgrade Vs Tottenham Hotspur: Rotasi Pertaruhan Poch
06 Nov 2019, 14:57 by Terjemahan, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Manajer Tottenham Hotspur, Mauricio Pochettino yang akrab dipanggil Poch, akan merotasi susunan pemainnya dalam pertandingan lanjutan fase Grup B Liga Champions di kandang Red Star Belgrane dinihari nanti, Kamis 7 November 2019.
Setelah mengalami kekecewaan dan mengalami trauma ketika bermain seri melawan Everton di Stadion Goodison Park, Liverpool, pada Minggu lalu dalam Liga Primer Inggris, Pochettino masih tetap kehilangan kiper Hugo Lloris, bek tengah Jan Verthongen, dan gelandang Erik Lamela karena alasan cedera. Pochettino juga meninggalkan Harry Winks, Kyle Walker, Serge Aurier, dan Victor Wanyama di London.
Pochettino hanya memiliki pilihan terbatas di posisi bek kanan dan kemungkinan besar Juan Foyth yang akan bermain di posisi tersebut melawan tuan rumah dari Serbia ini.
Sedangkan di lini tengah, Eric Dier menjadi andalan utama. Pemain yang baru direkrut pada musim panas ini, Ryan Sessegnon, kemungkinan kembali ke bangku cadangan setelah melakukan debutnya di Goodison Park. Danny Rose kembali diturunkan sebagai pemain starter.
Penyerang utama Harry Kane akan kembali menjadi ujung tombak setelah sempat istirahat karena kena virus.
Setelah mengalami keterpurukan beruntun dalam Liga Primer Inggris, manajer Mauricio Pochettino bersama pasukannya mencoba menebusnya di Liga Champions. Pada pertemuan pertama di Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, London, Rabu 23 Oktober 2019, tim asuhan Pochettino ini menang telak 5-0 dari Red Star Belgrade. Ini balasan yang setimpal setelah sebelumnya di tempat sama, Tottenham Hotspur digilas Bayern Munich 7-2.
Tottenham Hotspur harus menang dinihari nanti kalau mau terus menghidupkan peluang masuk dua teratas grupnya untuk lolos. Di urutan kedua saat ini, anak-anak dari London utara ini hanya unggul satu poin dari Red Star. Sedangkan dengan Bayern Munich di puncak klasemen, mereka terpaut jauh lima angka.
Berikut perkiraan susunan pemain Tottenham Hotspur (4-3-3): Gazzaniga; Foyth, Alderweireld, Sanchez, Rose; Dier, Sissoko, Ndombele; Son, Kane, Lo Celso.

FOOTBALL LONDON | SOCCERNET
text:
Red Star Belgrade Vs. Tottenham Hotspur: Poch Rotation Betting
Nov 6 2019, 14:57 by translations, Prasetyo Day
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tottenham Hotspur's manager, Mauricio Pochettino, who is fondly called Poch, will rotate the composition of his players in the next phase of the Champions League Group B match at home to Red Star Belgrane at dawn on Thursday 7 November 2019.
After experiencing disappointment and trauma while playing a series against Everton at Goodison Park Stadium, Liverpool, last Sunday in the English Premier League, Pochettino still lost goalkeeper Hugo Lloris, center back Jan Verthongen, and midfielder Erik Lamela due to injury reasons. Pochettino also left Harry Winks, Kyle Walker, Serge Aurier and Victor Wanyama in London.
Pochettino only has limited choices at right-back and most likely Juan Foyth will play in that position against the Serbian host.
While in midfield, Eric Dier became the mainstay. The new player recruited this summer, Ryan Sessegnon, is likely to return to the bench after making his debut at Goodison Park. Danny Rose was revealed again as a starter.
The main attacker Harry Kane will return to being the spearhead after taking a break due to a virus.
After experiencing successive slumps in the English Premier League, manager Mauricio Pochettino and his troops tried to make it up in the Champions League. At the first meeting at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, London, Wednesday, October 23, 2019, Pochettino's team won a landslide victory 5-0 from Red Star Belgrade. This is worth the reply after previously in the same place, Tottenham Hotspur crushed Bayern Munich 7-2.
Tottenham Hotspur must win at dawn later if they want to continue to turn their chances of entering the top two of the group to qualify. In second place at the moment, the children from north London are only one point ahead of the Red Star. Whereas with Bayern Munich at the top of the standings, they are five points adrift.
The following is the estimated composition of the Tottenham Hotspur players (4-3-3): Gazzaniga; Foyth, Alderweireld, Sanchez, Rose; Dier, Sissoko, Ndombele; Son, Kane, Lo Celso.

FOOTBALL LONDON | SOCCERNET
